title: (x) quirky serif w/ big x-height in Weakerthans banner - Fedra Serif {Roque, Lex}
content:
I love it and have no idea what it is

comments.content:
I can’t see any image.

- Lex
wow you are superquick; should be fixed now
also to clarify: I mean the “TheWeakerthansReunionTour” text at the beginning, not the other serif
hmmm I think it’s Fedra Serif actually; if it is, I just fell in love with it today

It’s hard to tell at that size, but I think it’s [Fedra Serif A.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232735/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typotheque/fedra_serif_a/?sample_text=TheWeakerthansReunionTour&sample_size=36)

- Lex

Self-identified in the time it took me to find the link :^)

- Lex
